trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Mountain View
There were no other sightings in Mountain View on or around June 15th 1995
divs: sighting detailsi was in the swimming pool at night with great weather conditions and great visibility no clouds just stars,the lights of the pool were on.i was with two nieghbors at the time and i was swimming across the middle of the pool slowly relaxing backstroke gazing at the stars when i saw in my periphrial vision directly south of me what i thought was a hawk or owl aproaching quickly toward us overhead appox 100 yards 30 feet up i was suprised to even realize i noticed it just then it object slowed as it approached the pool and flew directly overhead at a very slow rate of speed and so low the blue light reflecting from the bottom of the pool with the waters reflective ripples illuminating the craft only 30 feet above me.i was in awe and just stood erect with my mouth open unable speak or take my eyes off this beautiful craft.i soaked it all in it is burned in my memory.the craft slowly moved overhead as if it was letting me admire it,it resembled a hexagonal dumbell flat black in color the black area barely reflecting the water\light but the 2 ends of the craft the hexs were reflective gold and looked like material similar to what nasa uses on its satellites.no windows or lights,no sound,just the wind as it glided over as glider sounds,but this craft seemed totally the opposite of aerodynamic,and also seemed too small for human occupant\operator unless they were seated in the hexs on the ends.it then as it was around 40 yards past me it accelarated away in the same fashion it approached.i then looked over to see if my neighbors had witnessed the event only to see them making out oblivious to the event they missed out on.i said nothing and left the pool.the craft was approx 20 feet wide 10 feet long 6 feet thick
